// <auto-generated by Crisp Source Generator/>
#nullable enable

using Crisp.Runtime.Nodes;

namespace TestApp;

partial class ExprAI
{
    public partial Crisp.Runtime.BtNode Build()
    {
        return new SelectorNode(
            new SequenceNode(
                new ConditionNode(() => (this.DistanceTo(this.Target) < (this.AttackRange * 1.5f)), "DistanceTo(.Target) < .AttackRange * 1.5"),
                new ConditionNode(() => (this.Target != null), ".Target != null"),
                new ConditionNode(() => (this.CurrentState == AIState.Combat), ".CurrentState = AIState.Combat"),
                new ActionNode(() => this.Attack(this.Target), "Attack(.Target)")),
            new SequenceNode(
                new ConditionNode(() => (this.Target.Health > 0), ".Target.Health > 0"),
                new ConditionNode(() => ((this.MaxHealth - this.Health) <= 50f), ".MaxHealth - .Health <= 50"),
                new ActionNode(() => this.MoveTo(this.Target.Position), "MoveTo(.Target.Position)")),
            new SequenceNode(
                new ConditionNode(() => (this.Name == "Guardian"), ".Name = \"Guardian\""),
                new ConditionNode(() => (this.Health > -1), ".Health > -1"),
                new ConditionNode(() => (this.IsAlive == true), ".IsAlive = true"),
                new ActionNode(() => this.Idle(), "Idle()")));
    }
}
